EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Trading – Father’s Day Promotion Has Arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Mendoza]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotional-product.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Mendoza]]> Father’s Day is right around the corner and Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) has a great promotion going on.
MCDUs, Global Navigation, Computers, Satellite Data, Multi-Mode Receivers and more—those have to be at the top of everyone’s list!
The top 10 largest airlines in the world are on our marketplace. Register for free on GoDirectTrade.com today!
Join the aerospace marketplace of the future. Price, product images and quality documents are required on every listing and available for all of our valued customers.
SHOP HAT's SPECIAL CONNECTED SALE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotional-product.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=HAT_Mendoza]]>
